Package gbssg.Jamalia_Polat_Vrlec

Class Vector3D

java.lang.Object
gbssg.Jamalia_Polat_Vrlec.Vector
gbssg.Jamalia_Polat_Vrlec.Vector3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISerializer
public class Vector3D extends Vector implements ISerializer
This class Vector2D is a child class of the class Vector and is three-dimensional.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Filip Vrlec, Serkan Polat, Moiz Jamalia

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vector3D()
    This constructor only sets the dimension to three.
    Vector3D(double x, double y, double z)
    This constructor sets the dimension to three and sets the x, y, z values to its respective parameters.
    Vector3D(Point3D p1, Point3D p2)
    This constructor sets the dimension to three, gets three three dimensional points, from which the x and y attributes will be calculated.
